name: The Cauldon Kids: The Summoning of Mr Vermicelli
storyline: You're a 6 years old witch and today, you're home alone: turn the house upside-down, play games with your sister, race to other dimensions to bewitch your frog plushie!
summary: The Cauldron Kids is a pixel art short narrative RPG about two kid witches on their way to magical mischief and plushie bewitching, combining quirky and sweet dialogues and minigames. Featuring the small and cozy chalet the characters live in, players discover soon that the Cauldron Kids’ home is full of magical and playful surprises.
